short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: With Trust Vulpes you can browse more safely by seing how secure other users rated a particular website.
short.de: Mit Trust Vulpes hast du mehr Zuversicht beim browsen, indem du die Bewertung anderer Nutzer f√ºr eine Seite siehst.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Trust Vulpes you can surf more safely by seeing how safe other users have rated a particular website.

When you surf a website, the TrustVulpes symbol lights up in color in the upper right corner.

Blue indicates neutral. This means that there are no known threats on the website, but no user has submitted a rating yet.
Yellow means that the site is safe according to user opinions.
Pink means that there are reviews that warn users about.

Anyone who has TrustVulpes installed can rate the website to help other users rate the site as safe or unsafe.

TrustVulpes lives from the participation of the community
